name: Hate from the afterlife
description:
Hate from the Afterlife

Know the story of Marta and Leyla, two women destined to meet over and over again in several lifetimes.

An interactive novel based on the short story "Odio desde la otra vida" by writer Roberto Arlt.

Made in two weeks for the NaNoRenO 2022.

Features
  • Two endings.
Credits
  • 🐑 Sheepish Samitha > Art / UI / Localization
  • 🍑 Carenalga > Programming / Story
Made with Godot and Dialogic

You can find more about Dialogic here.
